verses.verse: After <S%G3326><s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> the feast of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3957>passover,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of unleavened <S%G106>bread:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G2212>sought<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> they might <S%G2902>take<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G1388>craft,<s%> and put him to <S%G615>death.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3361>Not<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1859>feast<s%> day, <S%G3379>lest<s%> there <S%G2071>be<s%> an <S%G2351>uproar<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2992>people.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5607>being<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G963>Bethany<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3614>house<s%> of <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3015>leper,<s%> as <S%G846>he<s%> sat at <S%G2621>meat,<s%> there <S%G2064>came<s%> a <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> an alabaster <S%G211>box<s%> of <S%G3464>ointment<s%> of <S%G4101>spikenard<s%> <S%G3487><s%> very <S%G4185>precious;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> she <S%G4937>broke<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G211>box,<s%> and <S%G2708>poured<s%> it <S%G2596>on<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2776>head.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> there <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> that had <S%G23>indignation<s%> <S%G4314>within<s%> <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G5101>Why<s%> was <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G684>waste<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3464>ointment<s%> <S%G1096>made?<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G5124>it<s%> might have <S%G1410>been<s%> <S%G4097>sold<s%> for more <S%G1883>than<s%> three <S%G5145>hundred<s%> <S%G1220>pence,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> have been <S%G1325>given<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4434>poor.<s%> <S%G2532>And<s%> they murmured <S%G1690>against<s%> <S%G846>her.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> Let her alone; <S%G863><s%> <S%G846><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> trouble <S%G3930><s%> <S%G2873><s%> ye <S%G846>her?<s%> she hath <S%G2038>wrought<s%> a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> me. <S%G1691><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> ye <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4434>poor<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1438>you<s%> <S%G3842>always,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3752>whensoever<s%> ye <S%G2309>will<s%> ye <S%G1410>may<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> good: <S%G2095><s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1691>me<s%> ye <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> always. <S%G3842><s%>

She hath <S%G4160>done<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> <S%G3778>she<s%> could: <S%G2192><s%> she is come <S%G4301>aforehand<s%> to <S%G3462>anoint<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> burying. <S%G1780><s%>

Verily <S%G281><s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you,<s%> Wheresoever <S%G3699><s%> <S%G302><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> <S%G2098>gospel<s%> shall be <S%G2784>preached<s%> <S%G1519>throughout<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G2889>world,<s%> this <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G3778>she<s%> hath <S%G4160>done<s%> shall be spoken <S%G2980>of<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> a <S%G3422>memorial<s%> of her. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2455>Judas<s%> <S%G2469>Iscariot,<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1427>twelve,<s%> <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> chief <S%G749>priests,<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G3860>betray<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> unto <S%G846>them.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3588>they<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> it, they were <S%G5463>glad,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1861>promised<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G694>money.<s%> <S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G2212>sought<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> he might <S%G2122>conveniently<s%> <S%G3860>betray<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> of unleavened <S%G106>bread,<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> they <S%G2380>killed<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3957>passover,<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G4226>Where<s%> <S%G2309>wilt<s%> thou that we <S%G565>go<s%> and <S%G2090>prepare<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> thou mayest <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3957>passover?<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he sendeth <S%G649>forth<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> of <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> Go <S%G5217><s%> ye <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4172>city,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> there shall <S%G528>meet<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G941>bearing<s%> a <S%G2765>pitcher<s%> of water: <S%G5204><s%> <S%G190>follow<s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> wheresoever <S%G3699><s%> <S%G1437><s%> he shall <S%G1525>go<s%> <S%G2036>say<s%> ye to <S%G3588>the<s%> goodman of the <S%G3617>house,<s%> <S%G3588>The<s%> <S%G1320>Master<s%> <S%G3004>saith,<s%> <S%G4226>Where<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2646>guestchamber,<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> I shall <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3957>passover<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> disciples? <S%G3101><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>he<s%> will <S%G1166>show<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> a <S%G3173>large<s%> upper <S%G508>room<s%> <S%G4766>furnished<s%> and prepared: <S%G2092><s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> make <S%G2090>ready<s%> for us. <S%G2254><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> went <S%G1831>forth,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4172>city,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> he had <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they made <S%G2090>ready<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3957>passover.<s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> in the <S%G3798>evening<s%> <S%G1096>he<s%> <S%G2064>cometh<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1427>twelve.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>they<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> to be <S%G3076>sorrowful,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> one by <S%G1527>one,<s%> <S%G3385>Is<s%> it <S%G1473>I?<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> said, <S%G3385>Is<s%> it <S%G1473>I?<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> It is <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1427>twelve,<s%> that <S%G1686>dippeth<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> dish. <S%G5165><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G3303>indeed<s%> <S%G5217>goeth,<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> him: <S%G846><s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3759>woe<s%> to <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> is <S%G3860>betrayed!<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> for <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> he had <S%G3756>never<s%> been born. <S%G1080><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G846>they<s%> did <S%G2068>eat,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> <S%G740>bread,<s%> and <S%G2127>blessed,<s%> and <S%G2806>broke<s%> it, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> Take, <S%G2983><s%> eat: <S%G5315><s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> body. <S%G4983><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2983>took<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4221>cup,<s%> and when he had given <S%G2168>thanks,<s%> he <S%G1325>gave<s%> it to <S%G846>them:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4095>drank<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>it.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> This <S%G5124><s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> <S%G3588>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1242>testament,<s%> which is <S%G1632>shed<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> many. <S%G4183><s%>

Verily <S%G281><s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you,<s%> I will <S%G4095>drink<s%> <S%G3364>no<s%> <S%G3765>more<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1081>fruit<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G288>vine,<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G3752>that<s%> I <S%G4095>drink<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> when they had sung a <S%G5214>hymn,<s%> they went <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3735>mount<s%> of <S%G1636>Olives.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> All <S%G3956><s%> ye shall be <S%G4624>offended<s%> because <S%G1722>of<s%> me <S%G1698><s%> <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> night: <S%G3571><s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> I will <S%G3960>smite<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4166>shepherd,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4263>sheep<s%> shall be scattered. <S%G1287><s%>
But <S%G235><s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> that I <S%G3165>am<s%> <S%G1453>risen,<s%> I will go <S%G4254>before<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> Galilee. <S%G1056><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>Although<s%> <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> shall be <S%G4624>offended,<s%> <S%G235>yet<s%> will <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1473>I.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> Verily <S%G281><s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G4671>thee,<s%> <S%G3754>That<s%> this <S%G4594>day,<s%> even <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G3571>night,<s%> <S%G4250>before<s%> <S%G2228>the<s%> <S%G220>cock<s%> <S%G5455>crow<s%> <S%G1364>twice,<s%> thou shalt <S%G533>deny<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> thrice. <S%G5151><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> <S%G3004>spake<s%> the <S%G3123>more<s%> <S%G1537>vehemently,<s%> <S%G4053><s%> <S%G1437>If<s%> <S%G3165>I<s%> <S%G1163>should<s%> die <S%G4880>with<s%> <S%G4671>thee,<s%> I will not deny thee in any <S%G3364>wise.<s%> <S%G533><s%> <S%G4571><s%> <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5615>Likewise<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> they <S%G3956>all.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> a <S%G5564>place<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> was <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G1068>Gethsemane:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G3004>saith<s%> to <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> Sit <S%G2523><s%> ye <S%G5602>here,<s%> <S%G2193>while<s%> I shall pray. <S%G4336><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G3880>taketh<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1438>him<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2385>James<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2491>John,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> to be sore <S%G1568>amazed,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to be very <S%G85>heavy;<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> My <S%G3450><s%> <S%G5590>soul<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> exceeding <S%G4036>sorrowful<s%> <S%G2193>unto<s%> death: <S%G2288><s%> <S%G3306>tarry<s%> ye <S%G5602>here,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> watch. <S%G1127><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he went <S%G4281>forward<s%> a <S%G3397>little,<s%> and <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1093>ground,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4336>prayed<s%> <S%G2443>that,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> it <S%G2076>were<s%> <S%G1415>possible,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> might <S%G3928>pass<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G3004>said,<s%> Abba, <S%G5><s%> <S%G3962>Father,<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> are <S%G1415>possible<s%> unto <S%G4671>thee;<s%> take <S%G3911>away<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G4221>cup<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> me: <S%G1700><s%> <S%G235>nevertheless<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G2309>will,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> wilt.

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2064>cometh,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2147>findeth<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G2518>sleeping,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> Simon, <S%G4613><s%> <S%G2518>sleepest<s%> thou? <S%G2480>couldest<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> thou <S%G1127>watch<s%> <S%G3391>one<s%> hour? <S%G5610><s%>

Watch <S%G1127><s%> ye <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4336>pray,<s%> <S%G3363>lest<s%> ye <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3986>temptation.<s%> <S%G3588>The<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G3303>truly<s%> is <S%G4289>ready,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> is weak. <S%G772><s%>
